walker.easydb.datatype
Class ETxtFile

java.lang.Object
  java.io.File
      walker.easydb.datatype.ETxtFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.io.File>, UpdateIdentifier
public class ETxtFile
extends java.io.File
implements UpdateIdentifier

文本文件类型，它映射数据库的文本大字段类型, 比如Oracle中的CLOB,当向CLOB字段写入时，会用到此类型。 This class extends the File class, it reflects the big text type column in database, such as CLOB type of oracle. If you want to write binary file into database, such as BLOB type of oracle or mysql, you can using walker.easydb.datatype.BinaryFile.

Author:
Huqingmiao
See Also:
EBinFile, Serialized Form
